titleStmt.title: A declaration of the povver of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament clearing their authority to judge delinquents for high-treason, and other high misdemeanors. With a full ansvver to all Judge Jenkins his arguments.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Jenkins, David. Judge Jenkins remonstrance to the Lords and Commons of the two Houses of Parliament, at Westminster, the 21. of February, 1647.
Annotation on Thomason copy: the 8 in imprint date crossed out and date altered to 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
